manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy clean Some additional features that are good to know: The inner trapway is fully glazed, which prevents stuff from seeping into the porcelain. As well our toilets come with a 2" wide trapway for a larger trapway diameter reduces the chance of clogging and overflow. And many more features you will love about me, they are just too much to share... Soft Closing Seat Compared to noisy traditional toilet seats, a soft close seat creates almost no noise, making it a great choice to ensure privacy in your bathroom. The quiet sound of these seats is useful for families with small children who have particular trouble with closing seats properly without losing their grip. Dual Flush A dual flush toilet drives lower water usage in your home, thereby saving money on your monthly water bill. Estimating, that 4,000 gallons of water can be saved annually in a residential household that employs dual flush toilets. 10" Rough in and 12" Rough in options Have you build your toilet but ended up with a 10" rough in? If so then go with this specific toilet that is designed for 10" rough in (Make sure to the select the MOTB10W model number to receive the 10" rough)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Searched far & wide for this toilet
reviews.reviewText: I needed a small toilet with a 10 inch Rough-in and only 16 inches wide and less than 28 inches deep. Looked everywhere and finally found it here. It’s great, it fit & looks wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Postage stamp bathroom? This is your toilet.
reviews.reviewText: We have an 11 square foot bathroom, and toilets from the big box stores do not fit. We also have a 10” rough in, so even fewer options.This toilet fits the space well, flushes well, and is easy to “use.” It is very functional.I did not have any trouble with the lid. I wouldn’t say it is small like a kids toilet. It is of standard height, not chair height. Bowl is of typical size.If you are looking for a “throne” this is probably not it.If you are looking for a space saving contemporary toilet, buy this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a small tiny toilet, not regular size
reviews.reviewText: I was under the impression that this was a regular sized toilet.When I opened it I was disappointed since it looked more like a kid's toilet.I sat on it and it was lower than regular, and It was not wide or long enough to cover everything that needed to be covered.So I returned it right away.The quality of the toilet was as expected for the price, it just looks more like a kids toilet than an adult toilet.CHECK THE DIMENSIONS FIRST BEFORE ORDERING THIS TOILET, to make sure that this small size toilet is what you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek design, easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: First one arrived with a crack, seller quickly sent a replacement. It’s one piece so get some help moving it in position. Everything you need is in the packaging (just get the hook up for the water supply). Works great, the one button push to remove the lid is a plus for cleaning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The toilet looks like it's for kids only!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we needed
reviews.reviewText: It's been 6 months since we replaced our beloved but old standard onepiece with this toilet. Our quarter bath added in the 1940s is not up to code for today's standard so we needed something super compact to fit the space. It uses far less water and has a much more effective flush. I love it. The only things that could be improved are the top buttons are a little rough on the edges and the toilet seat is so oddly shaped, I'm not sure if we could find a replacement if something happened to it. Love the soft lose seat. With 2 toddlers, this main floor toilet gets used often, and is a great upgrade. The seat is slightly higher than our old toilet which is nice for the adults.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: not so easy to install but it's finally working well.water flow is not too strong. you will have to hold the button for a second to get all water out. its not like you can press the button the leave it. you have to press and hold the button for a second until all water is out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My money flushed down the toilet on this buy!
reviews.reviewText: This toilet is really small. I've used the same standard size one in my home for almost 32 years and we remodeled our half bath so we decided to replace everything. I am dismayed at the size and the cost. It was double the price I paid for another toilet but the trap was 12 inches and I needed a 10 inch one. I purchased this particular toilet based on the recommendation of the contractor. I gave it two stars because I'm disappointed in the look. It looks like a toilet that should be used in a kiddie daycare center. I really wish I could send it back. If you are larger than a child then I DO NOT recommend that you purchase this toilet. It is not a standard size toilet!
